All Classes

Class
Description
Account
This class represent an Account for students in the database.
AccountChoiceDialog
Custom Dialog to pick an Account among a given list.
AccountPane
Account component where the account list is displayed and where you can update acocunts properties or add accounts.
AccountTableView
Custom TableView to display Account.
App
Main JavaFX class that extends Application base class.
Cart
Singleton class that represent the current cart as a list of items.
CartItemView
Component which represents an item of the Cart in the CartPane.
CartPane
Cart component where Cart, prices, purchase/clear buttons are displayed.
ChangedListenner
Listenner interface for event related to changes/updates in an object.
DatabaseConnection
Class that represents a connection to the application's main SQLite database.
HistoryEntry
Class that represents an history entry in the database.
HistoryPane
History component which contains the table of the history.
IntegerStringMoneyCallback<T>
Callback for the CellValueFactory to convert an Integer representing money to decimal String.
Item
Class that represents items available for sale.
ItemDialog
Custom Dialog to choose/edit Item properties.
ItemList
Singleton class that represents the list of available Item for sale.
ItemPane
Item pane component where items of the item list can be added to the cart and new items can be added.
ItemView
Item view which displays an Item which can be adde to the Cart and edit/delete buttons.
Launcher
JavaFX entry point class.
MoneyStringBindings
Non-instantiable class to wrap some usefull predefined StringBinding related to money conversion.
Updatable
Interface which allows a component to be updatable.
UpdateTab
Custom Tab which updates its content on selection changed if it implements the Updatable interface.
